HMH is a full-service creative marketing communications agency lucky enough to call Portland, Oregon, and Charlotte, North Carolina home.
Founded in 1978, we create and feed mutually beneficial relationships between our clients and their customers. Our clients include globally-recognized brands as well as local favorites.
